mapper.select: SELECT GONAME, GORVCODE, GORVMID, GORVGCODE, GORVTITLE, GORVCONTENTS, TO_CHAR(GORVDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS GORVDATE, GORVLIKE, GO.GOIMAGE, GORVHITS, GORVSTARATING FROM GOODSORDER GO INNER JOIN GOODSREVIEW GR ON GR.GORVGOCODE = GO.GOCODE ORDER BY GORVCODE
SELECT GORVCODE, GORVMID, GORVGCODE, GORVTITLE, GORVCONTENTS, TO_CHAR(GORVDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS GORVDATE, GORVLIKE, GORVHITS, GORVSTARATING FROM GOODSREVIEW WHERE GORVCODE = #{gorvcode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODSREVIEW(GORVCODE, GORVMID, GORVGCODE, GORVTITLE, GORVCONTENTS, GORVDATE, GORVLIKE, GORVGOCODE,GOIMAGE, GORVHITS, GORVSTARATING) VALUES(#{gorvcode}, #{gorvmid}, #{gorvgcode}, #{gorvtitle}, #{gorvcontents}, SYSDATE, 1, #{gorvgocode}, #{goimage}, 1, #{gorvstarating})
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODSREVIEW SET GORVHITS = GORVHITS+1 WHERE GORVCODE = #{gorvcode}
